title: Justice department will release Epstein files within 30 days, says US attorney general – US politics live
summary: Pam Bondi addressed the press following the US Senate's approval of a bill to release certain files. However, she indicated that an agency might withhold material related to a Trump-ordered investigation. The potential suppression of information raises concerns about transparency and accountability.

title: Arsenal v Real Madrid: Women’s Champions League – live
summary: Alessia Russo scored two goals, leading Arsenal to a comeback victory against Real. The match showcased Arsenal's resilience as they overcame a challenging opponent. Scott Murray provided a detailed minute-by-minute report of the thrilling game.

title: Turner: The Secret Sketchbooks review – the sheer number of pornographic drawings is a big shock
summary: JMW Turner left approximately 37,000 sketches upon his death, many of which have seldom been viewed. Among these are a significant number of explicit sketches that may provide insights into the enigmatic artist's life and character. The unveiling of these works prompts questions about their implications for understanding Turner.
